t: Amazon.com: AKG Perception P120 Professional Studio Microphone, Sliver : Musical Instruments
s: I'm using the AKG Perception 120 to both record & perform live. The sound is amazing. Though it's not a top-of-the-line mic (it's under $100 after all) I can definitely say that this is the single best side-access condenser mic for the price. The build quality is amazing.

t: Amazon.com: AKG Pro Audio Condenser Microphone, XLR, Sliver Blue, 165mm Long, 54mm Diameter (3101H00430) : Musical Instruments
s: For the longest time, I've owned the AKG Perception 120 (the old model), and I've never had a problem with this mic. The main reason to why I bought the P220 was so I can change my setup to have one mic for recording vocals (the P220) and the other mic for recording YouTube videos (Perception 120).
